createProfileRequest: Review request to create a new profile
editProfileRequest: Review request to edit a profile
deleteProfileRequest: Review request to delete a profile

new.web: Received a request to create a new profile in {groupName} via the web registration form
new.ahau: Received a request to create a profile in {groupName}

profile.edit: {applicantName} has requested to edit {profileName} in the {groupName} (tribe)
profile.delete: {applicantName} has requested to delete {profileName} in the {groupName} (tribe)

submission.new: A submission has been received from {applicantName} to edit {sourceName}
submission.accepted: This submission has been reviewed and was accepted
submission.rejected: This submission has been reviewed and was rejected
submission.review: This submission is waiting to be reviewed

noChanges: You must select atleast one profile field to approve this submission
reviewInfo: Select the profile information you would like to save
